snippet: The Republican presidential field narrows, and candidates head to New Hampshire | The historical precedents of a Republican insurgency.
abstract: The Republican presidential field narrows, and candidates head to New Hampshire | The historical precedents of a Republican insurgency.
lead_paragraph: Richard W. Stevenson, The Times's political editor, looks at the narrowing Republican presidential field as the candidates head to New Hampshire. Sam Tannenhaus, editor of the Book Review, examines the historical precedents of a Republican insurgency.

headline.main: TimesCast: Heading to New Hampshire, and a Look Back
